# Phase 2: QuickBooks API Integration

**Phase:** Phase 2 - Incremental Automation  
**Priority:** Medium  
**Due Date:** May 2025  
**Budget:** $0/month ✅ (FREE with QuickBooks Online Accountant!)

## Description

Integrate QuickBooks Online API for basic financial data synchronization to enable automated compliance reporting and audit trail generation.

**IMPORTANT:** Use **QuickBooks Online Accountant (QBOA)** - 100% FREE for verified accountants! Avoid expensive tax software ($600-6,000/year).

## Prerequisites

- [ ] QuickBooks Online Accountant (QBOA) account created ✅ FREE
- [ ] QuickBooks Developer account created ✅ FREE
- [ ] API credentials obtained ✅ FREE
- [ ] Phase 1 completion review passed

## Budget Breakdown (UPDATED!)

| Item | Estimated Cost | Notes |
|------|---------------|-------|
| **QuickBooks Online Accountant (QBOA)** | **$0/month** ✅ | **FREE for verified accountants!** |
| Azure Key Vault | $0/month ✅ | Free tier (10K ops/month) |
| Azure Functions | $0/month ✅ | Free tier (1M executions) |
| GitHub Actions | $0/month ✅ | Public repo (unlimited) |
| **Total Phase 2A** | **$0/month** ✅ | **100% FREE!** |

**3-Year Savings vs. Regular QBO:** $540 (avoided $15/month × 36 months) 🎉

**What to AVOID:**
- ❌ QuickBooks Tax ($600-1,200/year) - NOT needed for bookkeeping automation
- ❌ Lacerte Tax ($3,000-6,000/year) - Tax prep software (out of scope)
- ❌ ProSeries Tax ($1,500-3,000/year) - Tax prep software (out of scope)

## How to Get FREE QuickBooks Online Accountant

```yaml
Step 1: Visit
  URL: https://quickbooks.intuit.com/accountants/
  
Step 2: Sign Up
  Click: "Sign Up" → "QuickBooks Online Accountant"
  
Step 3: Verify Accountant Status
  Options:
    - CPA license number
    - AICPA membership
    - Accounting firm email (@cpa-firm.com)
    - ProAdvisor certification
  
Step 4: Instant Access
  Result: FREE forever (for verified accountants)
  Includes: Full API access, 30 client slots, sandbox testing
